mdRecord.dcterms:title: Alum Ridge Community Church, Alum Ridge District
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Located at 442 Berry Hill Road NW at the intersection of Berry Hill Road NW and Loss Bent Rd. NW. Graves are located just inside the perimeter fence to the left and rear of the left church building. The church, but not the graves, are visible from Google Earth. N 36 57.565' W 080 28.188'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
